Ark Server settings

General

Difficulty: 6x

Dino max levels are 180 for normal creatures and 228 for wyvern and tek etc.

XP Multiplier: 5x

Harvesting multiplier: 5x

Stack size multiplier: 200x

Water draining and starvation of players: 0.1x

The draining of food and water is reduced to 10% from 100%.

Taming

Taming speed multiplier: 15x

Wild creature starvation multiplier: 5x

Mating

Mating multiplier: 0.3x

The time between mating is reduced to 30% from 100%

Egg hatch speed multiplier: 15x

Baby mature speed multiplier: 15x

Baby cuddle interval multiplier: 0.1x

The time to imprint is reduced to 10% from 100%

Baby imprint amount multiplier: 100%

Baby lose imprint quality speed multiplier: 0

Dinos will not lose imprint quality

Player stats

Health: 1.5x

Stamina: 2x

Weight: 9999999999x

Food: 9999999999x

Water: 9999999999x

Fortitude: 10x

Oxygen: 20x

Melee: 3x

Speed: 3x

Dino stats

Stamina: 2x

Weight: 9999999999x
